content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently functioning, while the boiler is out of fuel.

### Copper plate mine at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, -73.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine
- Belt group that connects the furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0) to the assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when the boiler is not functioning
- Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel before attempting to operate it. The current status indicates that it is out of fuel.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Verify the positions of the entities before attempting to connect pipes. The connection attempt from the offshore pump to the boiler failed, indicating a need to check the placement and ensure that the pipes are correctly aligned.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. This will help avoid issues with overlapping entities. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
